test_cases.name: Happy Path: Senior Engineer with Strong Match
test_cases.description: Well-qualified senior engineer applying to matching role
test_cases.cv_text:
John Smith
Senior Software Engineer

Experience:
- Senior Software Engineer at Google (2020-2023)
  - Led team of 5 backend engineers
  - Built microservices architecture serving 10M+ users
  - Technologies: Python, FastAPI, PostgreSQL, Docker, Kubernetes
  - Reduced API latency by 40% through optimization

- Software Engineer at Amazon (2018-2020)
  - Developed payment processing system
  - Implemented CI/CD pipelines
  - Technologies: Java, Spring Boot, AWS

Education:
- BS Computer Science, MIT (2014-2018)
- GPA: 3.8/4.0

Skills:
- Languages: Python, Java, JavaScript, Go
- Frameworks: FastAPI, Django, Spring Boot, React
- Cloud: AWS, GCP, Docker, Kubernetes
- Databases: PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, Redis
test_cases.job_description:
Senior Backend Engineer

We're seeking a Senior Backend Engineer to join our platform team. You'll lead the development of scalable microservices and mentor junior engineers.

Requirements:
- 5+ years backend development experience
- Strong Python and FastAPI experience
- Experience with microservices architecture
- Cloud experience (AWS or GCP)
- Team leadership experience

Nice to have:
- Docker/Kubernetes expertise
- PostgreSQL optimization experience
test_cases.notes: Perfect match - all claims should be supported

test_cases.name: Edge Case: Sparse CV - Recent Graduate
test_cases.description: Recent graduate with minimal experience applying to entry-level role
test_cases.cv_text:
Alice Johnson

Education:
- BS Computer Science, UC Berkeley (2023)

Internship:
- Software Engineering Intern at Startup Inc. (Summer 2022)
  - Worked on web development using React

Skills:
- Python, JavaScript, React
- Git, basic SQL
test_cases.job_description:
Junior Software Engineer

Entry-level position for recent graduates. You'll work on our web platform and learn from senior engineers.

Requirements:
- BS in Computer Science or related field
- Basic programming skills (Python or JavaScript)
- Willingness to learn

Nice to have:
- Internship experience
- React knowledge
test_cases.notes: Sparse CV should not lead to invented facts

test_cases.name: Edge Case: Long Job Description with Many Requirements
test_cases.description: Comprehensive JD with 20+ requirements, candidate meets 60%
test_cases.cv_text:
Michael Chen
Software Engineer

Experience:
- Software Engineer at Tech Corp (2021-2023)
  - Full-stack development using React and Node.js
  - MongoDB database management
  - Worked in Agile team of 8

Education:
- BS Software Engineering, Stanford (2017-2021)

Skills:
- JavaScript, TypeScript, Python
- React, Node.js, Express
- MongoDB, basic PostgreSQL
- Git, Docker basics
test_cases.job_description:
Full-Stack Engineer - Expert Level

We need an expert full-stack engineer with deep expertise across our entire stack.

Required Skills (must have ALL):
1. JavaScript/TypeScript (5+ years)
2. React (expert level, 3+ years)
3. Node.js/Express (expert level)
4. Python (3+ years)
5. FastAPI or Django
6. PostgreSQL (advanced, query optimization)
7. MongoDB
8. Redis caching
9. Docker (production experience)
10. Kubernetes (orchestration)
11. AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS)
12. CI/CD (Jenkins, GitHub Actions)
13. Microservices architecture
14. GraphQL
15. WebSockets
16. Testing (Jest, Pytest, 80%+ coverage)
17. Security best practices
18. Performance optimization
19. Team leadership (led 5+ engineers)
20. Agile/Scrum master certification

This is a senior architect role requiring 7+ years experience.
test_cases.notes: Many requirements unmet - LLM might be tempted to embellish

test_cases.name: Edge Case: Mismatched Skills - Career Changer
test_cases.description: Candidate from different domain (mechanical eng) transitioning to software
test_cases.cv_text:
David Rodriguez
Mechanical Engineer transitioning to Software Development

Experience:
- Mechanical Engineer at AutoCorp (2018-2023)
  - CAD design and simulation
  - Project management
  - Team collaboration

Education:
- BS Mechanical Engineering, Georgia Tech (2014-2018)
- Online Certificate: Full-Stack Web Development, Coursera (2023)

Personal Projects:
- Built a task management web app using React and Firebase
- Created Python scripts for automation

Skills:
- Learning: JavaScript, React, Python
- Tools: Git, VS Code
- Strong problem-solving and engineering fundamentals
test_cases.job_description:
Software Engineer - Backend Team

Requirements:
- 3+ years professional software development
- Strong Python or Java experience
- Database design (SQL)
- RESTful API development
- Computer Science degree preferred
test_cases.notes: Domain mismatch - watch for invented software experience

test_cases.name: Edge Case: Overqualified Candidate
test_cases.description: PhD with research background applying to standard engineering role
test_cases.cv_text:
Dr. Sarah Williams

Education:
- PhD Computer Science, Stanford (2019-2023)
  - Thesis: "Deep Learning for Natural Language Processing"
  - Published 8 papers in top-tier conferences (NeurIPS, ICML)
  - Research focus: Transformer architectures, multilingual models

- MS Computer Science, Stanford (2017-2019)
- BS Computer Science, Caltech (2013-2017)

Experience:
- Research Intern at Google Brain (Summer 2021, 2022)
  - Developed novel attention mechanisms
  - Implemented models in PyTorch and TensorFlow
  - Collaborated with team of 12 researchers

- Teaching Assistant for CS229 Machine Learning (2020-2022)

Skills:
- Deep Learning: PyTorch, TensorFlow, Hugging Face Transformers
- Programming: Python, C++, CUDA
- Research: Experiment design, paper writing, peer review
- Mathematics: Linear algebra, probability, optimization
test_cases.job_description:
Machine Learning Engineer

Build and deploy ML models for our product recommendations system.

Requirements:
- BS/MS in Computer Science or related field
- 2+ years ML experience
- Python and scikit-learn
- Basic deep learning knowledge
- Ability to work in cross-functional team

Nice to have:
- Experience with PyTorch or TensorFlow
- Cloud deployment experience
test_cases.notes: Overqualified - ensure doesn't undersell or oversell

test_cases.name: Edge Case: Ambiguous Dates and Employment Gaps
test_cases.description: CV with unclear dates and unexplained gaps
test_cases.cv_text:
Robert Taylor
Software Developer

Experience:
- Freelance Web Developer (2022-present)
  - Built websites for small businesses
  - WordPress, HTML/CSS, JavaScript

- Software Developer at StartupXYZ (2019-2020)
  - Full-stack development
  - React and Node.js

[Gap: 2020-2022]

- Junior Developer at TechCo (2017-2018)
  - Internship that turned into full-time
  - Python scripting

Education:
- Bootcamp: Full-Stack Development (2016-2017)
- Some college coursework in Computer Science (no degree)

Skills:
- JavaScript, Python, PHP
- React, WordPress
- MySQL
test_cases.job_description:
Web Developer

Full-time position building customer-facing websites.

Requirements:
- 3+ years professional web development
- JavaScript and modern frameworks
- Database experience
- Portfolio of previous work

We value:
- Consistent work history
- Team collaboration
- Bachelor's degree preferred but not required
test_cases.notes: Watch for fabricated explanations of gaps or inflated experience

test_cases.name: Quantitative Metrics Test
test_cases.description: CV with specific numbers - test for numerical accuracy
test_cases.cv_text:
Jennifer Lee
Engineering Manager

Experience:
- Engineering Manager at DataCorp (2021-2023)
  - Managed team of 8 engineers (6 backend, 2 frontend)
  - Increased deployment frequency from 2x/week to 5x/week
  - Reduced production incidents by 35%
  - Managed $500K annual budget
  - Oversaw 3 products serving 2M monthly active users

- Senior Engineer at CloudTech (2018-2021)
  - Led migration serving 500K users with 99.9% uptime
  - Reduced infrastructure costs by $50K/year
  - Mentored 4 junior engineers

Education:
- MS Computer Science, CMU (2016-2018)
- BS Computer Science, UCLA (2012-2016)

Certifications:
- AWS Solutions Architect - Professional (2020)
- Certified Scrum Master (2021)
test_cases.job_description:
Senior Engineering Manager

Lead a team of 10-15 engineers building cloud infrastructure.

Requirements:
- 5+ years engineering experience
- 2+ years management experience
- Led teams of 5+ engineers
- Track record of improving team metrics
- Cloud platform expertise
- Budget management experience

Nice to have:
- MS degree
- Relevant certifications
test_cases.notes: Test numerical accuracy - should use exact numbers from CV

test_cases.name: Edge Case: Special Characters and International Background
test_cases.cv_text:
María José García-López
Software Engineer

Experience:
- Software Engineer at Tecnología Innovadora, Madrid, Spain (2020-2023)
  - Developed microservices using Spring Boot and Java
  - Collaborated with teams in España, México, and Argentina
  - Technologies: Java, Kotlin, PostgreSQL

- Junior Developer at Développement Logiciel, Paris, France (2018-2020)
  - Web development using Vue.js and Python

Education:
- Máster en Ingeniería Informática, Universidad Politécnica de Madrid (2016-2018)
- Licenciatura en Ciencias de la Computación, UNAM, México (2012-2016)

Languages:
- Spanish (native)
- English (fluent - TOEFL: 110/120)
- French (intermediate)
- Portuguese (basic)

Skills:
- Java, Kotlin, Python, JavaScript
- Spring Boot, Vue.js, Flask
- PostgreSQL, MongoDB
test_cases.job_description:
Backend Engineer - International Team

We're a global company with teams across Europe and Latin America.

Requirements:
- 3+ years backend development
- Java or Python expertise
- Experience working in distributed teams
- English proficiency required
- European work authorization preferred

Nice to have:
- Multi-language proficiency
- International work experience
test_cases.notes: Test handling of international names, accents, and languages

metadata.purpose: Golden test dataset for evaluation suite - covers happy path and edge cases
